com.flowpowered.react.math

Class Quaternion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.math.Quaternion

  • public class Quaternion
extends Object
    Represents a quaternion. The notation q = (x*i, y*j, z*k, w) is used to represent the quaternion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Quaternion()
      Default constructor.
      Quaternion(float x, float y, float z, float w)
      Constructs a new quaternion with the desired values for each component.
      Quaternion(float w, Vector3 v)
      Constructs a new quaternion from the w component as a float and the x, y and z component as a vector.
      Quaternion(Matrix3x3 matrix)
      Constructs a quaternion from the rotation element of the matrix.
      Quaternion(Quaternion quaternion)
      Copy constructor.

        public Quaternion()
        Default constructor. All values are zero.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion(float w,
                  Vector3 v)
        Constructs a new quaternion from the w component as a float and the x, y and z component as a vector.
        Parameters:
        w - The w component
        v - The vector for the x, y and z component

                  float y,
                  float z,
                  float w)
        Constructs a new quaternion with the desired values for each component.

        y - The value of the y component
        z - The value of the z component
        w - The value of the w component

        Constructs a quaternion from the rotation element of the matrix.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this quaternion, after addition is finished

        Returns:

        public Quaternion getUnit()

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The dot product of this and the other quaternion

      • getRotationAngleAxis

        public float getRotationAngleAxis(Vector3 axis)
        Gets the rotation represented as an angle around an axis. The angle part is returned by the method, while the axis, represented as a vector, will be stored in the passed vector parameter.
        Parameters:
        axis - The vector in which to store the axis component values
        Returns:
        The angle as a float

      • slerp

        public static Quaternion slerp(Quaternion quaternion1,
                               Quaternion quaternion2,
                               float percent)
        Interpolates a quaternion between two others using spherical linear interpolation.
        Parameters:
        quaternion1 - The first quaternion
        quaternion2 - The second quaternion
        percent - The percent for the interpolation, between 0 and 1 inclusively
        Returns:
        The interpolated quaternion
